entry.title: Combined summary - lightning-c RPC
entry.summary: In the Lightning-dev mailing list, a user named Alex P asked about the possibility of binding RPC to IP:port instead of a Unix socket. In response, Rene stated that there is currently no implementation for this feature but suggested asking in the bug tracker or through the c-lightning mailing list. Rene also provided a link to the ElementsProject/lightning GitHub repository and his contact information at the end of the email. The user seems to be aware of the option to edit the source code but is seeking guidance on whether there is a configuration parameter available for this purpose.The user is seeking help from the community to resolve their query regarding binding RPC to IP:port instead of a Unix socket.
